description: This industry placement courses will be taken in the final year of the Bachelor of Occupational Health and Safety Science (Hons). This course will provide real industry experience in an approved workplace. Students will be expected to be present in the workplace during normal working hours and undertake OHS related work as agreed between the workplace supervisor and the placement coordinator. Over the duration of the placement it is anticipated that the student will be exposed to a range of OHS professional competencies and will reflect upon these in a work journal.
restricted: Restricted to BOHSSc (Hons) students with Head of School consent
